titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1145) to implement a National Water Research and Development Initiative, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-82, by Mr. Arcuri.

It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Science and Technology now printed in the bill. All points of order against the committee amendment in the nature of a substitute are waived except those arising under clause 10 of rule XXI.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 44.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 352.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/22/2009--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1145) to implement a National Water Research and Development Initiative.
